thread.title_full: Rajant Corporation Attending ITS World Congress

title: Rajant Corporation Attending ITS World Congress
text:
Rajant Corporation Attending ITS World Congress Monday, October 05, 2015 by Rajant Print Email 
Rajant is attending the ITS World Congress on 5-9 October in Bordeaux, France, at booth E2. 
Rajant Corporation is the pioneer of Kinetic Meshâ„¢ networks and provider of pervasive, multi-frequency wireless solutions, offering fully mobile wireless broadband connectivity that is simple, scalable and easy to deploy. 
Learn how Rajant's kinetic mesh technology is the best route to a truly mobile intelligent traffic system As the world population continues to grow, so does the need for transport services, which, in turn, increases traffic congestion and intensifies the need for effective traffic management systems. 
However, a traffic management system is only as effective as the network infrastructure it rides on. Migrating to a truly mobile advanced traffic system requires that your network deliver the uninterrupted connectivity, high capacity, dynamic speed, and robust mobility needed to support advanced traffic applications such as: Traffic control and optimisation Vehicle classification and data collection Traffic speed and density monitoring Digital signage Parking management and billing Travel and weather information 
Visit Rajant at the ITS World Congress at booth E2 and find out how the company can help you migrate to a network infrastructure in which everything moves. To schedule a meeting on-site at ITS World Congress, email dbaumann@rajant.com. Follow Us:
